modName: Lovers in Skyrim - not multiple marriage - Set bed for your lover or child
descriptionHtml:
[url=https://www.darkcreations.org/files/file/1203-set-bed-for-your-loverchild/]https://www.darkcreations.org/files/file/1203-set-bed-for-your-loverchild/[/url]

"[b]Require "Lovers in Skyrim" (1.2.5.1+)[/b].
By default, when you set the "bed area" your lover/child may pick other beds.
With this mod, you can "assign" a bed to each lover/child.
Find the spell book at the Temple of Mara. "





@moderator - This *is* the description. It's a copy from author's website. Don't believe me? See it yourself.
author: Sw
